title: RITA S. VILLENA (0000-0003-4705-3233) - ORCID | Connecting Research and Researchers

biography.value:
Graduated at the Peruvian University Cayetano Heredia in Lima, Peru.
Master and PhD studies in Pediatric Dentistry at the Sao Paulo University -Brazil.
Winner of the research Hatton Award for the Brazilian Division – IADR (1997).
Past President of the Peruvian Division – IADR (2003-2005), Past President and board member of the Latin American Region of the IADR (2011-2014). Past President of the Peruvian Association of Dentistry for Infants (2012-2016). Chair of the Regional Development Program – IADR (2012-2014). Member of the WHO technical team (2013-2015) and of the IADR Centennial Task Force Meeting (2020).
Chair of the Pediatric Dentistry  Department at San Martin de Porres University in Lima, Peru since 2010.
Member of the technical group of the Peruvian Ministry of Health.
General co-coordinator of the Dental Caries Research Observatory for Children and Adolescents of the Latin American Region – IADR.
Member of the working group - Vision 2030, FDI.
Publications in the field of Prevention, Public Health and Pediatric Dentistry, with special interest in infancy.
Author of 14 book chapters in the Latin American region. Part of the editorial board of international journals.
Clinician with special attention in infants, working together with pediatricians in private practice since 2000.

keywords.content: Pediatric Dentistry, fluoride, public health, children, dental caries
